properties.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 4 at 8:28AM HST by NWS Honolulu HI
properties.description:
A prolonged period of very strong winds is becoming more likely
for the Big Island Summits beginning around Thursday night and
continuing into early next week. Wind speeds in excess of 55 mph
are possible, along with potential damage to unsecured objects and
dangerous driving conditions. The precise details on the timing
and actual wind speeds are still uncertain, but High Wind Watches
or Warnings will likely be needed for the Big Island summits
later this week.

NWSheadline: HAZARDOUS WINDS POSSIBLE AT THE BIG ISLAND SUMMITS LATER THIS WEEK
